name: pinwheel
title: Pinwheel
desc: Pinwheel Astro is a multipurpose SaaS theme
article:
An elegant and functional multipurpose SaaS landing page theme, meticulously designed to showcase any SaaS product. Highly customizable, feature-rich, and optimized for exceptional speed and performance.


Key Features:

  • Highly customizable (Color, Font, Menu, Social Links, SEO Meta Tags, etc.)
  • Taxonomy support
  • Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4
  • Fast by default (95+ Google PageSpeed Score)
  • Netlify setting pre-configured
  • Contact form support
  • Support OG image
  • Write and update content in Markdown / MDX
  • MDX components auto import
  • Includes draft pages and posts
  • Fully responsive on desktops, tablets, and smartphones
  • SEO Friendly

github.name: pinwheel-astro
github.description: Pinwheel is a multipurpose SaaS theme built with Astro and TailwindCSS.
